body:
Hi, guys!
I was under a big reflection and I did too much changes to my life IRL, and changes to my computer!  =3
I have now too much new friends in Avicus and I love all them <3
Someone I'll not saying who said me I should rejoin so I did it, then, aswell all avicus; AMA!
<3
Ask
Me
Anything!
